nodes.text: General Gurveer was a Human male who served the House of Thul during the Cold War.

In 3643 BBY, Gurveer was stationed on Alderaan during a civil war. He made a report to a citizen of the reconstituted Sith Empire that House Organa had offered to help the House Panteer to fight against the House Ulgo. The General wanted to neutralize House Organa's support so that House Panteer would turn to House Thul and the Empire for assistance.
